name: Yuggoth Dagger
effect: *A knife that belonged to the interstellar creatures called Yuggoths. It was forged from an unknown metal.*While [Equipped], [Targets] reduce their [Armor] by 2 (to a minimum of 0).

name: Worshipper's Blade
effect: *An old sword once carried by Hyperborean sailors. The blade has an ornate pattern, and it's dedicated to a snake god.*While [Equipped], gain +3 to [Armor].

name: Damascus Blade
effect: *This ancient blade was forged from Wootz steel, then converted into an Artificial Regalia. It boasts astonishing durability and overwhelming sharpness.*While [Equipped], reduce [Physical Damage] received by 2.

name: Sacrificial Holy Blade
effect: *A large sword that was used to take the head of sacrifices in ancient Albion.*While [Equipped], increase [Physical Damage] to non-[Boss] [Mononoke] by 5.

name: Ancient Sword of Irem
effect: *An ancient sword excavated from the ruins of a place called "Irem". Forged from a rare blue-green metal, it boasts tremendous power against undead and humanoids.*While [Equipped], when making [Physical Attacks] against [Class: Humanoid - Chaos], gain +1 [Physical Rank].

name: Korvaz Flame Sword
effect: *A greatsword that holds the power of that which brings flame. If it's user is not a godhunter, they will eventually be consumed by it's spiritual power and transformed into something else.*While [Equipped], bestow [Element: Fire] on [Physical Attacks]. Also, [Targets] reduce their [Armor] by 4 (to a minimum of 0).

name: Barzai's Crescent Moon Blade
effect: *A sword that emits a pale spirit light. It grants it's user the protection of Mars and Saturn via repeated magic rituals.*While [Equipped], when making a [Physical Attack], gain +1 [Rank] against [Class: Chaos / Undead].

name: Orichalcum Greatsword
effect: *A greatsword made from Orichalcum, favored by the aristocrats from Atlantis. It boasts outstanding power.*While [Equipped], increase [Physical Damage] to non-[Boss] [Mononoke] by 5.

name: Phoenix Longsword
effect: *A replica of the King of Hyperborea's favored sword. It shows extreme power when used to attack monsters.*While [Equipped], increase [Physical Damage] to non-[Boss] [Mononoke] by 5.

name: Hound Tongue
effect: A blue piercing spear similar to a syringe needle. It is made from the blue tongue of Tindalos creatures.While [Equipped], once per round, [Recover] 5 {HP} when performing [Damage Calculation].

name: Gla'aki's Spine
effect: An artificial regalia made from the thin spines of a lake dweller. A long piercing sword.While [Equipped], when performing a [Physical Attack], gain [Element: Poison] and reduce the targets [Armor] by 2 (Minimum 0).

name: Fetch Stick
effect: A spear-type artificial regalia with a metal tip on a bamboo handle. It has unparalleled power against Undead.While [Equipped], when performing a [Physical Attack] against [Class: Undead], gain +2 [Physical Rank].

name: Damascus Spear
effect: An artificial regalia made from Wootz steel. It is tremendously sturdy.While [Equipped], reduce [Physical Damage] taken by 2.

name: Sky Demon Claw
effect: A spear-type Artificial Regalia with the claw of a sky demon as its tip.While [Equipped], once per round when making a [Physical Attack], targets that fail their [Reactive Check] are [Installed] up to 2 Sq away.

name: Barzai's Crescent Moon Spear
effect: A weapon wrapped in pallid spirit energy. Using black magic rituals, it confers the protection of Mars and Saturn.While [Equipped], when making a [Physical Attack], gain +1 [Rank] against [Class: Chaos].

name: Orichalcum Spear
effect: An Orichalcum long spear, favored by Atlantis nobles. A rare regalia that has excellent power.While [Equipped], when making a [Physical Attack], gain +5 [Physical Damage] against non-[Boss] [Mononoke].

name: Shining Trident
effect: A shining cane of a Great Old One converted into a three-pronged spear. Terrible spiritual light can be emitted from the tip.While [Equipped], once per round when making a [Physical Attack], gain [Element: Light] and change the [Attack Action] to [Range: 6 Sq].

name: Trapezohedron Magic Spear
effect: A long spear with a sparkling black polyhedron at its trip. It has a terrible spiritual power.While [Equipped], when making a [Physical Attack], gain [Element: Magnet] and +1 [Physical Rank].

name: Magic Machete
effect: A type of Artificial Regalia patterned after a forestry knife.While [Equipped], once per round, [Targets] reduce their [Armor] by 3 (to a minimum of 0).

name: Damascus Axe
effect: *A waraxe Artificial Regalia constructed from Wootz steel. Extremely sturdy and offers good defense.*While [Equipped], reduce [Physical Damage] received by 2.

name: Remodelled Chainsaw
effect: *A chainsaw Artifical Regalia that was tuned up with illegal modifications. It's difficult to handle, but boasts high power.*While [Equipped], once per combat, the [Target] of the user's [Physical Attack] [Halves] their [Armor].

name: Silver Bast Claws
effect: *An Artificial Regalia that contains the protection of the cat god, Bast. Four claws attack to the back of each of the user's hands.*While [Equipped], treat as though [Equipped] with [Unarmed]. Additionally, [Targets] reduce their [Armor] by 3 (to a minimum of 0).

name: Clouded Glass Axe
effect: *This battleaxe-type Artificial Regalia was built with a special glass. It features an aerodynamic design that can warp space.*While [Equipped], twice per combat, the user may force the [Target] to move up to 2 squares in any direction, ignoring Engagements.

name: Ansata Ankh
effect: *A huge Ankh-Shaped Artificial Regalia. By projecting spirit energy into it, a blade of light appears that can cleave through mononoke.*While [Equipped], once per round, increase [Physical Damage] to non-[Boss] [Mononoke] by 5. (Name is a reference to Crux Ansata, the "other name" for an Ankh)

name: Mortlan's Scythe
effect: *A small, sickle-shaped Artificial Regalia equipped with a special crystal in its blade.*While [Equipped], once per combat after performing [Damage Calculation] for a [Physical Attack], the [Target] gains a -5 modifier to [Initiative] until [Combat End].

name: Orichalcum Axe
effect: *An Orichalcum Axe used by warriors of Atlantis for executions. It boasts tremendous cutting power.*While [Equipped], increase [Physical Damage] to non-[Boss] [Mononoke] by 5.

name: Spider God's Scythe
effect: *This sickle-shaped Artificial Regalia was created with the claws of a spider god. It boasts unparalleled sharpness*While [Equipped], once per round, the [Target] of a [Physical Attack] [Halves] their [Armor].

name: Orichalcum Mace
effect: A hammer made of Orichalcum used by Atlantis warriors on the battlefield. It has both high power and maneuverability.While [Equipped], reduce [Damage] from non-[Boss] [Mononoke] by 5.

name: Great Silver Key
effect: A replica of the silver key owned by the space-time god. It has a shape that combines an ancient lance with a key.While [Equipped], once per session, change the [Range / Target] of an [Attack Action] to [Combat Zone].

name: Damascus Guard
effect: Wootz steel knuckles or leg guards. It is extremely durable.While [Equipped], treat as if equipped with [Unarmed]. Additionally, reduce [Physical Damage] by 2.

name: Albion Pillars
effect: An artificial regalia made from the circular stones of ancient Albion.While [Equipped], once per round when making a [Physical Attack], move a target that fails their [Reactive Check] up to 1 Sq. away.

name: Damascus Hammer
effect: A hammer artificial regalia made of Wootz steel. It is extremely durable.While [Equipped], reduce [Physical Damage] by 2.

name: Orichalcum Cestus
effect: Orichalcum gloves or boots used by Atlantis warriors in the arena.While [Equipped], treated as though equipped with [Unarmed]. Additionally, reduce [Damage] from non-[Boss] [Mononoke] by 3.

name: Crystal Hammer
effect: A hammer created by the Old Ones, equipped with crystals that can store spiritual energy.While [Equipped], once per battle, add or subtract 1 to a [Spirit Dice] (Cannot go above 6 or below 1).

name: Black Pillar of Fallen Souls
effect: An artificial black pillar worshipped by one of the largest evil cults as the body of an evil god. It is wreathed in powerful mystical energy.While [Equipped], when making a [Physical Attack] against [Class: Humanoid - Beast], gain +2 [Physical Rank].

name: Ptah God
effect: A replica of the hammer of blacksmith god Ptah, which is said to have forged together the plates that support the world.While [Equipped], by spending x1 [Timing: Prep], the user may [Install] an [Obstacle] equal to a Large Building ([HP: 180 / [Armor: 10]) within [Range: 7 Sq.].

name: Denki-Shu
effect: *A special device constructed by the interstellar creatures known as Yuggoths. This device is a small metal ball wrapped in steel wire, that can fire blue lightning bolts by tightening it.*While [Equipped], bestow [Element: Shock] on [Physical Attacks].

name: Mirror Spray
effect: *A special device constructed by the interstellar creatures known as Yuggoths. This device is a twisted metal tube that can fire powerful blasts of cold air.*While [Equipped], bestow [Element: Cold] on [Physical Attacks].

name: Damascus Bow
effect: *A large metal bow made of Wootz steel. Because it's string is also made from the same material, it is neccesary to have a high level of skill or tremendous power when firing it.*While [Equipped], reduce [Physical Damage] received by 2.

name: Cat of Ulthar
effect: *A monster cat native to a place called Ulthar.*While [Equipped], the user may make [Ranged Attacks] or [Magical Attacks] after a [Combat Move]. Also, change the [Range] of [Physical Attacks] to [Range: 7 Sq.].

name: Night Gaunt
effect: *A combat-bike type Artificial Regalia created with alien technology. This living motorcycle feeds off of the spirit energy of it's owner, using it as power.*While [Equipped], the user may make [Ranged Attacks] or [Magical Attacks] after a [Combat Move].

name: ※Electrostatic Cannon
effect: *A powerful lightning rifle created by a tribe known for it's advanced technology. It's shape is reminiscent of a large, square hair dryer.*While [Equipped], bestow [Element: Shock] on [Physical Attacks]. Also, once per round, change [Target] to [Area].

name: Nitocris's Mirror
effect: *A bronze mirror-type Artificial Regalia with a demonic appearance. It can summon countless monsters that were sealed within it.*While [Equipped], bestow [Element: Phantom] on [Physical Attacks]. Also, [Targets] reduce their [Armor] by 3 (to a minimum of 0).

name: Orichalcum Greatbow
effect: *A massive Orichalcum bow used by aristocrats from Atlantis. This rare weapon boasts unrivaled range.*While [Equipped], increase [Physical Damage] to non-[Boss] [Mononoke] by 5.

name: ※ Atlantean Tablet
effect: *A piece of technology used as a power source in Atlantis, repurposed into a weapon. It fires powerful flashes of heat.*While [Equipped], bestow [Element: Fire] onto [Physical Attacks], and gain +1 [Rank] at [Damage Calculation].

name: Golden Branch
effect: *A research grimoire about the myths, magics, and beliefs of an uncivilized society. These magic books are relatively easy to obtain.*While [Equipped], once per combat, gain +1 to a {Conjure} check.

name: Emerald Tablet
effect: *A magic implement created with the power of alchemy. It's fragile, but contains powerful magical energy.*While [Equipped], once per combat, [Halve] the [Barrier] of the target of a [Magic Attack].

name: Book of the Dead
effect: *A heretical manuscript of a religion that performs human sacrifice and cannibalism.*While [Equipped], once per turn, increase the [Range] of a [Magical Attack] by +2 Sq.

name: Stone Man Monument
effect: *A collection of poems inside of a book with a red cover. You can inflict powerful hallucinations on an opponent by speaking the psalms within.*While [Equipped], once per turn, increase the [Target] of the user's [Magical Attacks] by 1#.

name: Eltdown Shards
effect: *An LCD tablet with a number of forbidden magical books installed. It describes experiments in Electroencephalography by a powerful race of mages that can manipulate spirit energy.*While [Equipped], once per session, change one [Spirit Dice] to "1".

name: Pohnpei Scripture
effect: *A manuscript that describes doctrines, discussions, and spells handed down by a south pacific tribe since ancient times. It contains powerful spirit energy.*While [Equipped], the user gains a +5 modifier to [Recovery] effects.

name: Zanthu Pottery
effect: *A translation of the contents of mysterious black slabs found in ancient ruins. It details the wisdom of ancient civilizations.*While [Equipped], increase the [Magic Damage] of [Racial Talents] by 5.

name: G'Harne Shard
effect: *A translated, decoded document of the characters written on mysterious clay slabs. It describes knowledge of the underground city of G'Harne and aliens.*While [Equipped], once per round, reduce the {Resist} check of the [Target] of a [Magical Attack] by 2.

name: Golias Apocalypse
effect: *An infamous magical grimoire about evil mononoke. It has been described as a method of contact with organisms from different dimensions.*While [Equipped], reduce [Damage] received from non-[Boss] [Mononoke] by 5.

name: Book of Unknown Spells
effect: *A copy of a spellbook about the avatar of ruin, written in an unknown language. Due to it's excessive power, care should be taken when handling it.*While [Equipped], once per combat, gain 1 [Overflow].

name: The King in Yellow
effect: *A manuscript of a play, covered in ornate bindings. By chanting it's beautiful but haunting contents, you can draw spiritual power from a powerful, evil god.*While [Equipped], when making a [Magical Attack], the [Target] gains a -5 modifier to [Barrier] (Minimum 0).

name: Celaeno Fragments
effect: *A magic book about a stone, alien tablet. It explains knowledge about the avatar of ruin and it's allies.*While [Equipped], gain +10 to [Armor].

name: Seven Solar Secrets
effect: *A collection of seven scrolls, written in ancient chinese, compiled into one book. It's written about the ancient gods.*While [Equipped], gain +10 to [Barrier].

name: Secret of the Beast
effect: *A magical grimoire wrapped in metal restraints. It was written about the legends of ancient egypt, their magic, and their knowledge of evil gods.*While [Equipped], by consuming [Start], gain +5 to [Damage Calculation] until after [Timing: End] of the current round.

name: Spiral God Scroll
effect: *A collection of ancient ritual literature written during the Xia dynasty. It was written on human skin, and contains extensive knowledge of evil gods.*While [Equipped], once per combat, change 2 [Spirit Dice] to [Overflow].

name: Necronomicon
effect: *A legendary book, written by an insane godhunter. This book details complex and bizarre magic rituals and contains the truths of the world.*While [Equipped], once per session, gain 2 [Overflow].

name: Book of Ivory
effect: *This is a copy of a book written by the Great Mage known as the Devil of Hyperborea. It contains knowledge about terrible darkness.*While [Equipped], once per combat, gain +{Main Stat} to Initiative.

name: Pnakotic Manuscript
effect: *This rare book is the oldest grimoire in existence. It's rarely available.*While [Equipped], once per session, gain +5 to an {Identify} or [Conjure] check.
